summary: Completed frontend testing of proportional scaling (ESCALADO PROPORCIONAL) feature. All 6 test cases passed. DurationAdjuster component works correctly - slider changes duration from 15-90 min, scale factor displays with correct colors (green for extension >100%, orange for reduction <100%), and all times (paragraphs, introduction, conclusion) scale proportionally.
passed_tests: DurationAdjuster component appears in right panel after PDF upload
Slider allows changing duration from 15 to 90 minutes
Scale factor displays correctly with percentage (e.g., 200%, 73%, 98%)
Scale factor color is GREEN for extension (scaleFactor > 1)
Scale factor color is ORANGE for reduction (scaleFactor < 1)
Scale factor color is NEUTRAL when close to original (~100%)
Paragraph times change proportionally when duration is adjusted
Introduction time changes proportionally (2:00 at 200% → 0:37 at 62%)
Conclusion time scales proportionally (verified in code)
Original total time displays correctly (27.4 min)
Configured time displays correctly in DurationAdjuster
Header time display updates when duration changes

duration_adjuster_component.details: Component renders correctly with Timer icon, title 'Ajuste de Duración', slider, and scale factor info

slider_functionality.details: Slider range 15-90 min works correctly, drag interaction updates duration in real-time

scale_factor_display.details: Shows percentage (e.g., 200%), original time (27.4 min), and configured time

scale_factor_colors.details: Green for extension (>105%), Orange for reduction (<95%), Neutral for ~100%

proportional_conclusion_time.details: Verified in code: getScaledConclusionTime() applies scaleFactor to conclusionDuration

critical_code_review_comments: useScheduleCalculator hook correctly calculates scaleFactor = totalDurationSeconds / originalTotalTime
Scale factor is bounded between 0.5x and 2x (lines 39-40) - good safety measure
ParagraphCard receives scaleFactor prop and applies it to estimatedTime calculation
Introduction and conclusion times scale via getScaledIntroductionTime() and getScaledConclusionTime()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Proportional scaling feature fully tested and working. The useScheduleCalculator hook is the central piece that calculates scaleFactor. DurationAdjuster component allows post-analysis duration adjustment. All paragraph times, introduction time, and conclusion time scale proportionally. Scale factor colors: green (>105%), orange (<95%), neutral (~100%).
